name: FRIGHT Prototype
description:
This is an early prototype of the game "FRIGHT", an open world survival horror game, in space.

Do note that right now there is nothing to play here; it's just a way to provide the game to our playtesters.

If you'd like to be a playtester (trying to break the game and also just finding bugs in it) or you just want to try the game, you're more than welcome to download it.
